summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Training Participants Admin Panel feature. All 13 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified all components work correctly including statistics display, filter buttons, view details dialog, diploma dialog, and navigation.
critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper separation of concerns
Frontend uses REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL correctly for API calls
All text is properly translated to Swedish as required
data-testid attributes could be added to interactive elements for better test automation
seed_data_creation: Used existing test participant 'bashar test' with 21 hours attendance and completed status
context_for_next_testing_agent: Training Participants feature is fully functional. Test participant 'bashar test' (ID: ee1f7ae1-0e59-410a-83a5-98c8918c051f) has 21 hours attendance and diploma already sent. Backend tests are in /app/tests/test_training_participants.py. All API endpoints tested: GET list, GET by ID, PUT status, PUT attendance, POST generate-diploma, POST send-diploma.

backend_apis: GET /api/training-participants - Returns list of registered participants ✓
PUT /api/training-participants/{id}/attendance with 21 hours - Auto-sets status to completed ✓
400 handling for diploma generation without 21 hours ✓
frontend_ui: Statistics cards show correct counts (Total, Pending, Accepted, Rejected, Completed) ✓
Filter buttons work correctly (Alla, Väntande, Accepterade, Avslagna, Godkända) ✓
Participant cards display name, email, phone, event, attendance progress ✓
View details dialog shows all registration information ✓
Diploma dialog shows download and email options ✓
Navigation from Admin Dashboard to Training Participants page ✓
